short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CSVifier is a Chrome extension that allows you to easily export data from websites to a CSV file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CSVifier is a Chrome extension that allows you to easily export data from websites to a CSV file. With Csvifier, you can select the data you want to export, and the extension will generate a CSV file with the data. CSVifier is perfect for anyone who needs to collect data from websites and save it in a CSV format, such as students, researchers, and business analysts.

Here are some of the features of CSVifier :

- Easy to use: Simply select the data you want to export, and Csvifier will do the rest.
- Flexible: You can customize the data that is exported, and you can also define custom filters.
- Powerful: Csvifier can export data from even the most complex websites.

If you need to export data from websites to a CSV file, then Csvifier is the perfect Chrome extension for you.

Here is an example of how CSVifier could be used:

You are a student and you need to collect data from a website about the prices of different products. You can use Csvifier to select the data you need, and the extension will generate a CSV file with the data. You can then open the CSV file in a spreadsheet program to analyze the data.
